text: 4.7: Sng 95.7-8Fhe Bakɨme mpari vhɨrve vov vhɨzgim, ana wom harigi tuga mbe sarigi. Ana mba tuga sarav khaŋ nzuai, “Ntigera!” Ana wo bunin Devit ga suaŋgim, ana nta bun nzuai, ana ntigem mba fhum suaŋgi kameŋra suaŋgi, “Nde ntigem Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ mbarararga, nde wari won ndavi havharɨ thari.”
